com.versant.var.common
Class VARAdminHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.var.common.VARAdminHelper

public class VARAdminHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class is useful for accessing the runtime status information of the various replication server modules. The server modules are accessed via RMI to get the runtime status information such as:

  • Uptime
  • Total and free memory
  • Class path
  • Java VM details (vendor, version, home)
  • other properties specific to each module

See Also:
